name: Into The Cave (pozzen)
description:
Into The Cave

A small platformer game wherein you must raid the cave and destroy the evil creature that dwells below.

Note:
If you get the error message ' abort(114). Build with -s ASSERTIONS=1 for more info.​' when trying to play the web version on Firefox, click on the shield icon in the URL bar and select "Turn off Blocking for This Site".

Controls:
A/Left Arrow: Move left (select when in menu).
D/Right Arrow: Move right (start when in menu).
Both keys at once: Jump.

Credits:
Art and Programming by Pozzen

Font: Press Start 2P by Codeman38

Contains music ©2019 Joshua McLean (mrjoshuamclean.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International

Software Used:
Bfxr - Sound Effects
Aseprite - Art
Godot 3.1 - Game Engine

This game was originally created for the Two Button Jam
